CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, pg. 23 reads: "Courier's Pittsburgh Home Service Fair...7. TID-BITS - With tid-bits served by Mr. Katz and Mrs. Mabel Mills of the Best Foods, Inc., booth, fair-going homemakers file past the Pet Milk booth where generous samples of Pet's Dry Nonfat Skim Milk were served by Edward Solow of the wholesale division and his assistants, Robert Kensinger and William Fagan. Miss Joyce Gibson, cute attendant, is not shown...All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Customers receiving food samples from Mr. Katz, Mabel Mills, Edward Solow, Robert Kensinger, and William Fagan, at the Best Foods, Inc. booth, for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Ammon Center
CatSubject_tab: Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
